item.title: First reading, referred to Finance (Not Officially read and referred until adoption of Introduction report).

item.title: 👍💵Nick Streuli - Port of Seattle
item.description: Nick Streuli signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Port of Seattle. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.title: ❓Steve Ewing - Dept. of Revenue
item.description: Steve Ewing signed up to testify Other. They are signed up to represent Dept. of Revenue.

item.description: Scott Hazlegrove signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent WA State Auto Dealers Association. They are a registered lobbyist.
